titles.title: Workplace Education Act of 1993

To amend the National Literacy Act of 1991 to establish in the Department of Labor an Office of Workplace Education to provide workplace education services to small businesses and to provide grants to States to improve the productivity of those businesses.

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Workplace Education Act of 1993 - Amends the National Literacy Act of 1991 to direct the Secretary of Labor to establish an Office of Workplace Education to make grants to States for workplace education programs for small businesses. Amends the Job Training Partnership Act to: (1) require a specified portion of funds be used for such office and such workplace education grants; and (2) reduce the percentage of non-disadvantaged individuals allowed to participate in training services for the disadvantaged.
